message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. To start, I propose a price of $9500 for the product.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. This is my top price for the product, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product to you and our previous discussions, I am willing to negotiate at $8700 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8350. This is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product to you at $8500. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not at $8500. I'm willing to meet you at $8200, which is the price I mentioned in my initial counteroffer. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I understand your position, Bob. After reviewing our past negotiations, I am willing to agree on a price of $8400 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product to both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not at $8400. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8400 and my target price of $8200. Let's try $8300. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.

Considering our previous discussions and the value of the product to you, I am willing to agree on a price of $8350 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go above $8300. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
